Craig Benko, Ph.D.

Hi, I am Craig Benko, an atomic, molecular and optical physicist. I earned my Ph.D. from JILA and the University of Colorado, Boulder under Professor Jun Ye. I currently reside in Bozeman, MT where I work at a small tech company called S2 Corporation.

Feel free to browse my CV.
